insert: INSERT INTO SUPPLIER_FORM (SUP_ID, SUP_NAME, SUP_ADDRESS, SUP_PHONE) VALUES (#{supID}, #{supName}, #{supAddress}, #{supPhone})
INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTE_FORM (ATTRIBUTE_ID, ATTRIBUTE_SUP_ID, ATTRIBUTE_ADD_ID, ATTRIBUTE_K_ID) VALUES (#{attributeId}, #{attributeSupId}, #{attributeAddId}, #{attributeKindId})
INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTE_FORM (ID, PRO_DATE, EXP_DATE, ) VALUES (#{id}, #{proDate}, #{expDate}, )
INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTE_FORM (ADD_ID, ADDRESS, ADD_PHONE, ) VALUES (#{addID}, #{address}, #{add_phone}, )
INSERT INTO ATTRIBUTE_FORM (A_ID, PRICE, WEIGHT, ADAPTIVE ) VALUES (#{addID}, #{price}, #{weight}, #{adaptive} )
